summary: An new purpose for Pelagius wing in Blue Palace
descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New][size=4][b][u]Install after the quest : Mind Of Madness
[/u][/b][/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]As you cure Pelagius from his condition,so does the dark spirits inhabiting Pelagius Wind,go away.
The Elisif has invested a great ammount of money,and people of Solitude are all about the newest event in their city.
The Gallery & Sallon,has been now opened in the place of Pelagius Wing,and all are invited.

[/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]Where is an paintings gallery,small caffee and a little Bal Room.[/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]
[/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]There are two new npc.[/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]In future I was thinking of also puting waypaths for Court members.[/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]
[/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]Enjoy :)[/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]
[/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][b][i]Credits :[/i][/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][b][i]FPI Research[/i][/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][b][i]Oarystos[/i][/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][b][i]Insanity[/i][/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][b][i]Scarla[/i][/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][b][i]Strotti[/i][/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][b][i]Lor[/i][/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][b][i]Core[/i][/b][/size][/font]
author: ibrica_orahovac
